{"step_by_step_thinking": "Mouth breathing can be categorized based on the cause. Obstructive mouth breathing is caused by an obstruction in the nasal airway forcing the person to breathe through their mouth. Anatomic mouth breathing is due to a physical abnormality such as a deviated septum.
